# Question 6: 

```{r}
print(mean(data$Age))
print(max(data$States))

```


# Dplyr way
```{r}
summary_df <- data %>%
  summarize(
    Mean = mean(Age),
    Max = max(States),
    Median = median(Siblings)
  )

summary(summary_df)

```
